article_title: Israeli Parliament Backs Law Critics Say Is Aimed at Groups Supporting Palestinians
article_text:
TEL AVIV—A contentious law that would require nonprofit groups operating in Israel and the Palestinian territories to disclose their foreign funding sources has passed its first hurdle in parliament, as a wave of Palestinian violence has stoked hawkish sentiment among some Israeli politicians.

Those groups and independent critics say the legislation unfairly targets groups that advocate Palestinian statehood to solve the...

twitter.description: A contentious law that would require nonprofit groups in Israel to disclose their foreign funding sources has passed its first hurdle in the Israeli parliament, as a wave of Palestinian violence fuels a hawkish atmosphere among Israeli politicians working to curb it.
twitter.title: Israeli Parliament Backs Law Critics Say Is Aimed at Groups Supporting Palestinians
